attributes.action: allow Miss Marcellin, the resident tutor in Constables to be granted a work permit, so she can continue to live and provide her invaluable support to all those in the house and school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stephanie Marcellin is resident tutor in Constables boarding house, at Uppingham School. Recently we have been told that she will not be allowed to stay for her second year here as her work permit has been rejected, and the house are heartbroken. She is a key member in our house, and we would be at a loss without her. She is indesenible in her role as tutor to many people, and a great help both academic and in sports. She is also a huge emotional support, and she will be missed greatly by all members of the house

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
